bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Layer 2 Transport Protocol for Time Sensitive Applications in a Bridged Local Area Network
IEEE Standard for Layer 2 Transport Protocol for Time Sensitive Applications in a Bridged Local Area Network

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The protocol, data encapsulations, and presentation time procedures used to ensure interoperability between audio- and video-based end stations that use standard networking services provided by all IEEE 802 networks meeting quality-of-service requirements for time sensitive applications by leveraging concepts of IEC 61883 are specified in this standard.

The protocol, data encapsulations, and presentation time procedures used to ensure interoperability between audio- and video-based end stations that use standard networking services provided by all IEEE 802 networks meeting quality-of-service requirements for time-sensitive applications by leveraging concepts of IEC 61883 are specified in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
